recommendations.title: OCD is so much more than handwashing or tidying. As a historian with the disorder, here’s what I’ve learned
recommendations.excerpt: Research decisions made by clinical psychologists in the 1970s can help explain why so many people, myself included, struggle to make sense of our obsessional thoughts.

recommendations.title: How to Deep Clean Your Mattress Quickly and Easily
recommendations.excerpt: Cleaning Lab Director Carolyn Forte explains how to clean a mattress yourself.

recommendations.title: Kolkata See and Do: If you like ghosts and ghouls
recommendations.excerpt: Calcutta Walks takes travellers on a hair-raising tour across Kolkata’s most haunted sites and spirits.

recommendations.title: Five Ways Mindfulness Helps You Age Better
recommendations.excerpt: Research suggests that being more mindful in our everyday lives can protect our health as we age—and may even help us live longer.

recommendations.title: These Startups Have a Plan to End Shein’s Fast Fashion Dominance
recommendations.excerpt: Shein may go public next year, solidifying its market dominance. Resale sites like Vestaire Collective and ThredUp have a plan to take it down.

recommendations.title: What We Learn from the Lives of Critics
recommendations.excerpt: They didn’t mean to become critics; they probably hoped to be better known for that novel. But, when something cuts them to the quick, they need you to know.

recommendations.title: 14 Homemade Snack Recipes to Munch On
recommendations.excerpt: Whether you're preparing for a casual get-together or stocking the snack drawer for low-blood sugar moments, these recipes are here to help.

recommendations.title: Sentiment Albums Hold the Seeds of Modern Fandom
recommendations.excerpt: These socially connected, multimedia 18th-century assemblages were more than the sum of their parts.

recommendations.title: How one Indian label is empowering and preserving the weaver communities of Odisha
recommendations.excerpt: And championing the region’s traditional craftsmanship and textiles.

recommendations.title: 7 Therapists Share Their Best Advice for Coping With Existential Dread and Grief
recommendations.excerpt: The world is a mess right now, but there are ways to cope.

recommendations.title: The history of game hints pages, before the internet took over
recommendations.excerpt: POKEs, maps and cheats.

recommendations.title: A Day in the Life of a Fossil Preparator
recommendations.excerpt: Although it leaves few written traces, the work of preparing specimens is a crucial component of scientific research.

recommendations.title: The Climate Canvasses of the Little Ice Age
recommendations.excerpt: Low Country artists of the late Renaissance and Early Baroque eras captured the happiness and hardships of snowy winters—an ever rarer phenomenon now.

recommendations.title: VIDEO: Workers recycling India's e-waste underpaid, unprotected
recommendations.excerpt: Seelampur is the largest electronic waste dismantling market in India. The industry is largely unregulated and laborers work in poor conditions.

recommendations.title: At the revamped Taj Mahal New Delhi, a younger interpretation of luxe
recommendations.excerpt: Post a refurbishment that has taken around three years and over Rs 200 crore, the iconic hotel's restaurants, rooms and the coveted private members club Chambers have all been 'reimagined' to fit new definitions of luxury for the Gen Z and millennial affluent.

recommendations.title: Freeing Ourselves From The Clutches Of Big Tech
recommendations.excerpt: Right to repair and other efforts to liberate technology from monopolistic corporations is a precondition for winning many vital societal battles.

recommendations.title: Tales of Chanan Singh Dhillon, an Indian soldier in World War Two who cheated death on land and sea
recommendations.excerpt: An excerpt from ‘Camouflaged: Forgotten Stories from Battlefields,’ by Probal Dasgupta.

recommendations.title: A Dad’s Love of Making Daily Lunchboxes for His Daughter Took Him to MasterChef India
recommendations.excerpt: Harish Closepet started making tiffins for his daughters and turned that into an Instagram page called Harry’s lunchbox. Today, he’s among the Top 6 contestants on MasterChef India and talks about why men should cook.

recommendations.title: The new pregnancy announcement is no announcement
recommendations.excerpt: More parents are skipping the stylized “We’re expecting!” post in favor of waiting for birth.

recommendations.title: A way of saying ‘we shall overcome’: Playing football on Robben Island
recommendations.excerpt: The Makana Football Association was another way to resist apartheid by political prisoners in the South African jail.

recommendations.title: This Was the Year Dad Movies Ruled the Multiplex
recommendations.excerpt: Sure, Barbie and Taylor Swift didn't exactly flop either—but 2023 treated dads (and other dad-identifying people) to a slew of films about boats, bombs, race cars, World War II, and other Peak Dad subject matter.

recommendations.title: Can You Buy Good Vibes?
recommendations.excerpt: There are plenty of problems you can solve with money, but at a new breed of upscale wellness destinations, you need more than cold hard cash.

recommendations.title: Ego, Fear and Money: How the A.I. Fuse Was Lit
recommendations.excerpt: The people who were most afraid of the risks of artificial intelligence decided they should be the ones to build it. Then distrust fueled a spiraling competition.

recommendations.title: 5 Ways for Leaders to Cultivate a “Spirit of Excellence” in Teams
recommendations.excerpt: By supplementing the “principle of marginal gains” with these practical steps, you’ll be well equipped for the journey towards excellence.

recommendations.title: Iconic Star Betelgeuse Will Temporarily Vanish From the Sky Next Week
recommendations.excerpt: In a rare cosmic event, an asteroid will eclipse Betelgeuse on December 11, causing a brief but significant disappearance of this bright, red star.

recommendations.title: The Restaurant Trends That Defined 2023
recommendations.excerpt: Maximalist dining rooms, TikTokers everywhere, and so many martinis! These were the restaurant trends that shaped a year of eating out.

recommendations.title: Why You Stay Up So Late, Even When You Know You Shouldn’t
recommendations.excerpt: There are certain traits that lend themselves to “revenge bedtime procrastination.” There’s also a way out.

recommendations.title: World War Two: When 600 US planes crashed in Himalayas
recommendations.excerpt: A newly opened museum in India houses the remains of American planes that crashed in the Himalayas during World War Two

recommendations.title: Every James Bond Movie, Ranked
recommendations.excerpt: From Connery to Craig, here are the best takes on 007.

recommendations.title: Is There a Safest Seat on an Airplane?
recommendations.excerpt: Experts debate whether there is a safest place to sit on an airplane in the case of an emergency.
